review: i had a panic attack when i got killed by chika and freddy

i watered a plant and it says 'this action will have consequences' what. any way. This is a really detailed game so if you have 5 bucks go buy it and if you liked it get season pass ep 2-5 for 16 bucks thats what i did. 10/10

If you want to play this game, play with friends. I've soloqued about 3 times in the past week and i've won 2/3 of them and the one i lost i was qued with tollers. If you play with friends (i would recommend a full lobby) it makes it a lot easier to win if your teammates are good.Over all i would give this game a 8/10.
